attributes.action: Make a law so that all private hire/minicabs to have cctv cameras installed to ensure the safety of the driver and the passenger.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like there to be a law stating that all private hire/ minincab drivers should have cameras in there car to prevent them from being accused of things that have not happened and also it will protect the passenger. I also think it will make people less likely to attack a driver or rob him if they know they are being caught on camera.
